snippet: Collin McHugh did not make the Astros’ opening-day roster but is taking advantage of a late-developing spot and has two impressive victories for Houston.
abstract: Extra Bases column; Houston Astros pitcher Collin McHugh did not make team's opening-day roster but is taking advantage of a late-developing spot and has logged two impressive victories for Houston; McHugh, who finds writing cathartic, blogs about his experiences in the majors, good and bad; other MLB news and developments noted.
lead_paragraph: Collin McHugh did not make the Astros’ opening-day roster but is taking advantage of a late-developing spot and has two impressive victories for Houston.

headline.main: A Whole New Chapter for a Writing Pitcher
headline.print_headline: A Whole New Chapter for a Writing Pitcher
